verbs.description: [ARG0: some] [V: called] [ARG1: him] [ARG2: cujo] others knew him as the dog but in this utah town all knew him as a killer the school had been terrorized by a dog that officials said had developed a taste for blood and killed other animals for fun it was four months with everyone on edge before a death warrant was issued the dog was shot but not before it left a trail of death west valley animal services los angeles times demeter jaws utah sarah hilton jaws film morris bastian programmer
